title: Calories in Red Potatoes
meta_description: Discover calories in red potatoes per 100 g serving, including carbs, protein, fiber, and full nutrition breakdown for boiled red potatoes.
assumptions: Boiled red potatoes with skin, no added salt or butter; medium-sized red potatoes (~148 g each).
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by size, cooking method, added ingredients, and variety; check labels or use a tracker for precision.

quick_answer.text: 100 g of boiled red potatoes provides ~77 kcal, mostly from carbs with good fiber content.

label_note: Values align with Nutrition Facts labels for straightforward comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in 100 g red potatoes?
faqs.a: Approximately 77 kcal for boiled red potatoes with skin.
No, about 17.8 g carbs per 100 g, but with 1.7 g fiber.

faqs.q: Calories in one medium red potato?
faqs.a: Around 114 kcal for a 148 g medium boiled red potato.
Yes, about 1.9 g protein per 100 g.

faqs.q: How does cooking affect calories in red potatoes?
faqs.a: Boiling keeps calories low; frying or adding oil increases them significantly.
